content_html:
Overview

Robotix Industries is a leading provider of autonomous systems and robotic solutions. Our mission is simple: build better machines that get the job done.

Founded by Dr. Ivo Robotnik, we specialise in creating highly capable robots for defence and industrial applications. Our team of expert engineers works around the clock to deliver cutting-edge autonomous systems.

Capabilities

  • Autonomous robotic platforms
  • Surveillance and monitoring systems
  • Custom robot manufacturing
  • Advanced threat detection
  • Rapid prototyping of mechanical contraptions

Discriminators

Unmatched Expertise

Our robots are built by the best in the business. No task too complex.

Industrial-Scale Production

We can mass-produce robotic fleets in record time.

Proven Track Record

Over 30 years of experience (with minor setbacks involving blue hedgehogs).

Complete Automation Solutions

From concept to deployment - we handle everything. No task too ambitious.
